SENT.plain: Positron emission tomography/CT examination was performed to 62-year-old male patient with diagnosis of Hodgkin lymphoma for treatment response which revealed complete response
During re-evaluation process of this patient in our department, asymmetrical brain metabolism defect of right thalamus and hipometabolism of right parietal lobe was observed
This finding was confirmed with additional CT imaging as a subacute infarct tissue
